title: Call for 2023 Applications: The Stigler Center Affiliate Fellowship
dc:creator: ProMarket writers
description:
The Stigler Center is seeking candidates for the second class of its Affiliate Fellows program. The George J. Stigler Center for the Study of the Economy and the State at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business designs, discusses, and disseminates ideas and research on political economy, the role of special interests, and the […]
